title: Which is the best option, the PGDCA or the O-level? - Quora
tags: Post Graduate Diploma in Computer Applications

response.answer_text: If you want to apply for JOA then pgdca is of no use and the recruitment body authorise only O or A level certificate from DOEACC although pgdca can be helpful for you to get better knowledge about c++ and it can also fetch job related to software technology and private company

PGDCA gives students the career prospects of becoming System Analyst, Software Engineer, Training Faculty, EDP Manager and many more.... 'O' level course is a basic course while a PGDCA Diploma is supposed to be more advanced. DOEACC 'A' level course is considered equivalent to PGDCA course though…
